ch.lambdaj.function.matcher
Class HasArgumentWithValue<T,A>

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<T>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public final class HasArgumentWithValue<T,A>
extends LambdaJMatcher<T>

A matcher that returns true if the value resulting from the evaluation af the given argument matches the given matcher.

Author:
Mario Fusco

public static <T> HasArgumentWithValue<T,java.lang.Boolean> havingValue(java.lang.Boolean argument)
Creates an hamcrest matcher that is evalued to true accordingly to the value of the passed argument

Parameters:

Returns:

havingValue

public static <T,A> HasArgumentWithValue<T,A> havingValue(A argument,
                                                          org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher)
Creates an hamcrest matcher that is evalued to true if the value of the given argument satisfies the condition defined by the passed matcher.

Parameters:
argument - The argument defined using the Lambda.on(Class) method that has to be matched
matcher - The matcher against which the value of the given argument has to be compared
Returns:
The hamcrest matcher that is evalued to true if the value of the passed argument matches the given matcher
